newsitem.title: JAPAN: Nippon Soda shares at year high in early afternoon.
newsitem.headline: Nippon Soda shares at year high in early afternoon.

text.p: Shares in Nippon Soda Co Ltd hit their high for this year in early afternoon trade on Thursday, brokers said.
As of 0418 GMT, the shares were 17 yen higher at 989 yen with a trade volume of 3.34 million shares, and were the third most heavily traded issue on the Tokyo Stock Exchange.
Nippon Soda's previous high was 988 yen set on June 21.
Brokers said the issue was finding buyers on speculation that the agricultural chemicals maker will post solid profits.
